abstract: Ugandan senior prosecutor Joan Kagezi is shot and killed by two men on motorcycle while driving home; police think attack is connected to her role as chief prosecutor in trial involving 2010 bombing by Shabab militants during World Cup finals.
lead_paragraph: A senior Ugandan prosecutor, Joan Kagezi, was shot and killed late Monday in what the police said might have been a targeted killing connected to her prosecution of bombing suspects.

headline.print_headline: Africa; Uganda: Prosecutor Is Fatally Shot

snippet: A senior Ugandan prosecutor, Joan Kagezi, was shot and killed late Monday in what the police said might have been a targeted killing connected to her prosecution of bombing suspects.
